devManufacturer.name: devManufacturer
devManufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the product.

devProduct.name: devProduct
devProduct.description: This attribute does not apply to SST devices.

devVersion.name: devVersion
devVersion.description: This attribute does not apply to SST devices.

devSerialNo.name: devSerialNo
devSerialNo.description: This attribute does not apply to SST devices.

devInstallation.name: devInstallation
devInstallation.description: The date and time, in DMI-defined format, when the component was (last) installed.

devVerify.name: devVerify
devVerify.description: A level of verification that the device software is installed and functioning. This attribute is not currently supported.

devName.name: devName
devName.description: The unique, platform-defined name of the device.

devShortDesc.name: devShortDesc
devShortDesc.description: The platform-defined short description of the device.

devLongDesc.name: devLongDesc
devLongDesc.description: The platform-defined long description of the device.

devUniversalId.name: devUniversalId
devUniversalId.description: The unique, platform-defined identifier for the type of device.

devVariant.name: devVariant
devVariant.description: The identifier for the specific hardware configuration of the device, indicating what hardware the device has.

srvServiceTable.name: srvServiceTable
srvServiceTable.description: This group defines the attributes of the services associated with the device..

srvServiceEntry.name: srvServiceEntry
srvServiceEntry.description: This defines the contents of the table.

srvServiceIndex.name: srvServiceIndex
srvServiceIndex.description: A unique, platform-defined name for each service.

srvServiceVariant.name: srvServiceVariant
srvServiceVariant.description: The current configuration of the service, indicating the additional transaction facilities available to the transaction application.

srvServiceState.name: srvServiceState
srvServiceState.description: This indicates the current level of availability of the service parts to the transaction application.

srvServiceMaintenance.name: srvServiceMaintenance
srvServiceMaintenance.description: Maintenance information associated with the last state change in the service: M-Code, M-Status and M-Data.

srvServiceReplenishment.name: srvServiceReplenishment
srvServiceReplenishment.description: Replenishment status data associated with the last state change in the service: RS-Data.

srvServiceClearState.name: srvServiceClearState
srvServiceClearState.description: Setting the value of this attribute clears all parts of the service to a good (fully functioning and available) state, but does not guarantee that the fault has been cleared.

srvServiceClearTallies.name: srvServiceClearTallies
srvServiceClearTallies.description: Setting the value of this attribute clears all tallies supported by the service.

srvServiceTallyTable.name: srvServiceTallyTable
srvServiceTallyTable.description: This group defines the attributes of the counters supported by the device service to record the operations, usage and performance of the device it manages.

srvServiceTallyEntry.name: srvServiceTallyEntry
srvServiceTallyEntry.description: This defines the contents of the table.

srvServiceNameIndex.name: srvServiceNameIndex
srvServiceNameIndex.description: A unique name for each service.

srvServiceTallyIndex.name: srvServiceTallyIndex
srvServiceTallyIndex.description: A unique number for each tally.

srvServiceTallyValue.name: srvServiceTallyValue
srvServiceTallyValue.description: The current value of the tally.
